markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Know it All](/Feats.aspx?ID=2664) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Pathfinder #164: Hands of the Devil](/Sources.aspx?ID=75) pg. 76

**Archetype** [Eldritch Researcher](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=89)

**Prerequisites**
[Eldritch Researcher Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=2658)

</column>

---

Your knowledge of abstruse topics is unparalleled. When you succeed at a check to [Recall Knowledge](/Actions.aspx?ID=26), you gain additional information or context. When you critically succeed at a Knowledge check, at the GM's discretion you might gain even more additional information or context than normal.
name: Know it All
primary_source_raw: Pathfinder #164: Hands of the Devil pg. 76
